title: Family of former US Marine detained in Russia speaks with Biden after his Texas stop - CNN
content:
1. Family of former US Marine detained in Russia speaks with Biden after his Texas stop  CNN
  2. Family of Marine veteran in Russian prison 'disheartened' at being denied visit with Biden  Fox News
  3. Full video: President Biden lands in Fort Worth on Air Force One  WFAA
  4. President Biden declines Texas meeting with family of former US Marine jailed in Russia  KWTX
  5. Biden vows to help veterans exposed to burn pits, saying he won't repeat mistakes made after Vietnam War  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The family of an American detained in Russia spoke with President Joe Biden on Tuesday shortly after waving at the President's passing motorcade in Fort Worth, Texas.
